description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              I. General invoicing, collecting and accounting
              

              *General Entry
              
              •	Be responsible for general ledger FAST / SAP accounting sys entry e.g., Revenue, Cost of Sales, Expense, Fixed Assets, Accrual , Provision and Amortization and so on.
              
              •	Check the all local incoming invoices to ensure compliance of the accounting policy.
              
              •	Assist the month-end closing and year-end closing (B/S, P/L, Internal report)
              

              *E invoice & VAT invoice
              
              •	Generate E VAT to customers
              
              •	Be responsible for monthly tax report
              
              •	Communicate with operation teams for invoice process
              
              •	Distribute and Send VAT invoices to customers and filing
              

              *Cashier
              
              •	Process bank daily payment and collection, as well as on-line bank operation
              
              •	Issue, keep and manage check and bank draft
              
              •	Check original reimbursement forms; deal with reimbursement according to corporation internal policy
              
              •	Input bank vouchers to system FAST and SAP
              
              •	Monthly bank reconciliation, daily cash report, ad-hoc reporting
              
              •	Liaise with banks for any related banking issues timely
              
              •	Timely and properly achieve of bank statements
              
              •	Prepare E payment(HSCB bank)
              
              •	Safekeeping of Financial Special Seal
              

              *AR/AP
              
              •	Prepare the local payment request
              
              •	Post local payment journal in system
              
              •	Make reconciliation between operation system and Accounting system, as well as Golden-tax system
              
              •	Local Agent/Customer and Vendor outstanding reconciliation
              
              •	Distribute and safe keep overseas incoming invoices
              
              •	Send outgoing invoices to overseas agents for outstanding reconciliation
              
              •	Prepare receipt/disbursement vouchers of overseas AR/AP and allocate in SUN 5 accordingly
              

              *Legal, tax return Document Filing
              
              •	Generate Voucher
              
              •	VAT Filing
              
              •	Register information of tax return and filing
              
              •	Timely prepare tax return and filing
              
              •	Update the VAT information of customers in the system
              

              *System Maintenance
              
              •	Create account code of customer the in Riege/FAST and SAP system
              

              II. AR/AP/Netting
              
              •	Prepare monthly statements to group companies/overseas agents/overseas customers
              
              •	Handle Dachser group companies/overseas agents/overseas customers on monthly reconciliation and year-end confirmations
              
              •	Handle Dachser group companies/overseas agents/overseas customers to ensure the timely settlements for SOA based on the agreed payment terms
              
              •	Handle Netting system
              
              •	Prepare weekly invoicing report to head office
              
              •	Prepare regular aging reports including both local and overseas with the consolidation
              
              •	Coordinate Regional office for disputation or other issues on overseas AR/AP
              
              •	Provide credit control and analysis
              

              III. Manage the account codes setup and maintenance in the system for group companies/overseas agents/overseas customers
              
              Prepare DSO/DPO Analysis reports
              
              Prepare ad hoc reports on request
              

              IV. Quality Assurance
              
              •	Master data maintenance (FAST/SAP Riege/Ottelle and all other possible coming application)
              
              •	Master data quality control
              
              •	Prepare various Quality Assurance report
              
              •	Prepare Loss shipment Report
              
              •	File management
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Work well with persons in the company:
              

              •	Work with Accountant team
              
              •	Work with Finance team
              
              •	Work with Operation and Others team
              

              With persons external company:
              

              •	Communicate with banks to manage cash and bank expenses
              
              •	Communicate with tax bureau to ensure statutory work
              

              *Education
              

              •	Associate Degree in Accounting/ Finance
              

              *Experience
              

              •	At least 3 years Logistics Industry Experience
              

              *Computer Skills
              

              •	Good computer skills, MS office (specially excel and power point) and is compulsory
              

              *Core Competencies
              

              •	Teamwork and cooperation
              

              •	Result orientated
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
